title: The Escapades of Augie Atwell
description: The village of Rumbletwoza is in danger and the only one who can save it, is Augie Atwell. With a little faith, the help of a princess, an odd trekker, and a talking lemur named Lodus, Augie will come face to face with creatures always believed to be fictional. Blizzard lizards, talking sharks, fire breathing dragons, and the witch that Augie must stop in order to save Rumbletwoza and its people.
author: L. Ann Price
